results.title: The effect of metformin on ameliorating neurological function deficits and tissue damage in rats following spinal cord injury: A systematic review and network meta-analysis
results.text_hl: For the parameter of efficacy, we primarily focused on the dynamic changes of locomotor function after @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ intervention, and paid attention to the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on the @<m>DISEASE_Soft_Tissue_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017695 @@@tissue damage@@@ in @DISEASE_Spinal_Cord_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D013119 @@@SCI@@@.
